Articles.Content:
Hi,

I really don't know if this thread belongs here, I couldn't find any place better. So, I purchased the game last week via PayPal. I got no email of the purchase, however, PP shows that the transaction is completed. I wrote two messages (PP receipt attachedÃƒâ€ ) to the support email address after reading through the FAQ. One on the 5th anoter on the 7th this month. Still no reply.

The account for the website was created successfully, but I can't see my purchase there neither.

What should be my next step?

Hi.

Moved this to the Kerbal Network forum. I'll also notify Ted and Maxmaps about this. We'll see what happens!
Thank you very much! I knew there was an appropriate place for just I'm too blind to find it...
Same problem here... Puchased, payed via PayPal, received PayPal-msg, sent it to support...

Same problem here... Puchased, payed via PayPal, received PayPal-msg, sent it to support...

Problem solved.

Thank You!!
I'm happy for you. Mine is still unsolved...
